title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API that lets you download, configure and chat with 70+ open-source models (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) on macOS, Linux & Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; install via pip and talk to any local model with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; lets web apps call local Ollama endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a first-class LLM & embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; docker run gives you multi-model chat, file uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; Maven Central artifact to integrate local LLMs into JVM apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting & prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion & inline chat to the editor.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector & horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama installations on macOS & Linux.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama; NuGet package with async chat & model APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed bindings and an async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama/api.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for local AI note assistance & summarization.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration offering OllamaGenerator & OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Hugging Face Space demo that runs Ollama in a Gradio UI; lets users test models in-browser.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama ecosystem discussions, model tips, and community integrations.
